Cisco CEO John Chambers has reached out directly to the president of the United States in response to the latest revelations about NSA snooping .

In a letter to President Obama picked up by both The Financial Times and Recode , Chambers pointed to the latest allegations that the National Security Agency intercepted Cisco routers and other equipment in order to secretly install surveillance software .
